name: Absolute Champion -  A Unique Fighting Game! (Canceled)
blurb: Absolute Champion is a MMA - MMORPG for those who crave competition, glory, and cash! Fight for fun and for real money.

rewards.reward:

You will receive a credit as a backer in the game credits.

Black Belt 3rd Dan •••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••• Digital:
Thank you for your pledge!
See your name in the credits page as a thanked backer and get into the first public beta when it is available. You will also receive a Kickstarter backer's logo for use in-game and a PDF fighter's guide, plus an official digital AC Poster with your fighter on it. •••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••• In-Game:
Reserve your Global Nickname before the general release. ● 250,000 in-game currency. ● 3 tickets to 1-credit tournaments ● Gold account for 1 month

Reserve your Global Nickname before the general release. ● 450,000 in-game currency. ● 2 tickets to 1-credit tournaments ● 1 ticket to 3-credit tournaments ● Gold account for 1 month
